QueryName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

QueryDescription.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

QueryExpression.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags for the stored query.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags for the stored query.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
